title: ⛴ "Think of all the beauty still left around you and be happy." - Anne Frank
content:
(thanks Gabor!): Given a string in dice notation, return a random integer you can get by rolling those dice.

Example:

> rollDice('4d4') // Four 4-sided dice
> 13

> rollDice('3d20') // Three 20-sided dice
> 28

> rollDice('1d8+2d10') // One 8-sided dice, and two 10-sided dice
> 21
